content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, implied use of alcohol and drugs, graphic depictions of oral, vaginal, anal, and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids, mention of rape, blackmail.
